TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
Public MustInherit Class BitmapEffect Inherits Animatable

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is .
Defines a bitmap effect.

summary.span: 派生类将定义可应用到 对象（如 或 ）的效果。

span.span: Derived classes define effects that can be applied to a object, such as a or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 位图效果都是呈现的软件。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不应将位图效果应用于大型视觉对象或动画，，因为这样做会降低性能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations, because this can degrade performance. > [!CAUTION] > 位图效果不支持部分信任的执行。Bitmap effects do not support partial trust execution. 应用程序必须具有完全信任权限才能使用位图效果。An application must have full trust permissions to use bitmap effects. 应用效果之前，缩放转换将应用到视觉对象。Scale transforms are applied to a visual before an effect is applied. 发生非统一的缩放转换时效果将使用较大的缩放值。In the event of a non-uniform scale transform, the effect will use the larger of the scale values. 更新的可视化树将不会传播如果画笔的父链中。Updates to the visual tree of a will not propagate if a is in the brush's parent chain. 可以在所带来的影响的父对象上强制场景的更新来解决此限制。You can work around this limitation by forcing an update of the scene on the parent object of the effect. 你可以调用或包含一个动画，若要强制场景更新。You can call or include an animation to force a scene update. 自定义效果继承此类，以创建非托管的效果的托管的接口。Custom effects inherit this class to create a managed interface to the unmanaged effect. 有关详细信息，请参阅[非托管 BitmapEffect](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms735092.aspx) API。For more information, see the [Unmanaged BitmapEffect](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms735092.aspx) API.

span.span: for inheriting the class.
Associated enumerations:

para.span: 必须重写以初始化在托管代码中的非托管的效果。

span.span: must be overridden to initialize an unmanaged effect in managed code.

para.span: 非托管的效果具有用户可以修改的属性时，则必须被重写。

span.span: must be overridden when an unmanaged effect has properties that the user can modify.

para.span: 结合使用此方法更新非托管的属性。

span.span: Use this method in conjunction with to update your unmanaged properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 对用于初始化自定义效果的 [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) 对象创建句柄。

span.span: Creates a handle to an [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) object that is used to initialize a custom effect.
A handle to an [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过处理与自定义效果 framework 交互[IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16)对象。Framework interaction with custom effects is handled through an [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) object. 使用自定义效果通过初始化的外部效果方法。The outer effect is initialized with the custom effect through the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现使用方法来检索包装影响对象。The following example shows an implementation of that uses the method to retrieve a wrapper effect object. [!code-csharp[RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip#CreateUnmanagedEffect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip/CSharp/RGBFilterBitmapEffect.cs#createunmanagedeffect)] [!code-vb[RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip#CreateUnmanagedEffect](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip/visualbasic/rgbfilterbitmapeffect.vb#createunmanagedeffect)]
